sentences.sContent: An organism, such as a fish or reptile, having a body temperature that varies with the temperature of its surroundings; an ectotherm.
sentences.sContent_eng: An organism, such as a fish or reptile, having a body temperature that varies with the temperature of its surroundings; an ectotherm.
sentences.sCn: 恒温 动物一种 体温恒常且不受外界温度影响的生物体，象哺乳 动物或鸟；
